sentences.en: A demon in shape of man is always behind us to appropriate her.
sentences.cn: 象人一样的魔鬼老跟在我们后面想占有她.

sentences.en: Anything worth doing is worth doing well , even being demon bait.
sentences.cn: 做事情就要有专业精神, 即使是当魔鬼诱饵.

sentences.en: Everyone has a few demon words.
sentences.cn: 每个人都会碰上几个古怪难记的词.

sentences.en: He discerned the fact that his demon secret was abroad, universal.
sentences.cn: 他领悟到,他那可怕的密秘已经不胫而走, 众所周知了.

sentences.en: He is a demon for work.
sentences.cn: 他做起工作来真是精力过人.

sentences.en: He was speeding down the motorway as if pursued by a demon.
sentences.cn: 他在高速公路上飞速行驶，就像有魔鬼在追赶他似的。

sentences.en: He's very violent: it's the demon drink, you know.
sentences.cn: 他大撒酒疯, 你要知道就是因为喝了那种酒.

sentences.en: It is said that demon of drought caused the drought.
sentences.cn: 传说中旱魃是引起旱灾的怪物.

sentences.en: She worked like a demon all through rehearsals.
sentences.cn: 她每次排演时始终精力过人.

sentences.en: She's a demon for work, ie works very hard.
The festival commemorates the slaying of the demon buffalo.
sentences.cn: 那个节日是为了纪念杀死魔牛。

sentences.en: When they came to the fork of the road, his horse turned left into a bypath as if it were possessed with a demon and began to run headlong down the hill.
sentences.cn: 当他们来到叉路口时, 他的马就好像被鬼缠住似的,转向左边的小路而急速地冲下山坡去.

words.tran_cn: 信仰魔鬼；对鬼怪的崇拜（等于demonolatry）；魔鬼学

phrases.tran_cn: 工作起来精力过人的人，拼命工作的人，劳动能手
狂人似的；拼命地；技艺高超地

trans.tran_cn: 魔鬼，恶魔，精力过人的人，邪念
